sentences: Martyn LeNoble (Dutch: Martijn LeNoble; born 14 April 1969)
In 1992, he joined Peter DiStefano, Stephen Perkins and Perry Farrell to form Porno for Pyros.
In 2008, LeNoble began dating actress Christina Applegate.
LeNoble and Applegate became engaged on Valentine's Day 2010, and married in February 2013.
They have one daughter, Sadie Grace LeNoble, born on 27 January 2011.
